Room.Name: Elven Dignitary's Quarters
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the quarters of Illia, elven dignitary from Riverdell.
Room.LongDescription: Illia is usually at her desk, signing papers and other important documents. She is a strong fighter from the elven community of Riverdell and is considered an expert bowyer. The elven city of Riverdell is quite a distance to the north of Kista, so Illia tends to stay here for many days or even weeks at a time. Her quarters are less lavish and not decorated near as much as Travis' and Drowlin's quarters.
